1015460.name: Foundation Soundtrack
1015460.description:
Foundation Soundtrack - by Audinity (Yannick Suess & Robin Birner)

Track List:

01 - Foundation
02 - Terroir
03 - Coterie
04 - Redoubt
05 - Alis Volat Propriis
06 - Nuces Relinquere
07 - Firmly Planted
08 - Reprieve and Rally
09 - Reticent Birr
10 - Semper Pro Grediens
11 - Of Finer Cloth
12 - Reverie
13 - Aere Perennius
14 - Velum Caligo
15 - Onus Erstwhile
16 - Chary Squire
17 - Gutta Cavat Lapidem
18 - Ignis Aurum Probat
19 - Oblecation
20 - Uthceare, ceased
21 - Ab Intra
22 - Gestalt
23 - Otia Dant Vitia
24 - Apotheosis
25 - Ubi Bene, Ibi Patria
26 - Hearth and Bulwark
27 - Festina Lente
28 - Idyll Moil
Bonus - Reticent Birr Piano Version

*This soundtrack will get new tracks as game content evolves.
